premise_source_doc_sentence: For her portrayal of the French singer Édith Piaf in the biopic La Vie en Rose  (  2007  )  , Cotillard achieved worldwide recognition and won her second César Award , a BAFTA Award , a Golden Globe Award , a Lumières Award and the Academy Award for Best Actress , becoming the first and  (  as of 2017  )  only actor to win an Academy Award for a performance in French , and also the second actress and one of only six actors to have won this award for a part spoken in a foreign language .
